description:
Located at the heart of Le Havre, Hotel Spa le Pasino features an indoor swimming pool, a spa with sauna and a casino on site. It offers guest rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a queen-size bed and some offer views over the harbour. All private bathrooms include a hairdryer and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Spa le Pasino. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the spa bath at the hotel's spa.

Le Havre Train Station is a 6-minute drive from the hotel and free private parking is available on site. Malraux Museum is 1 km away.

Hotel Gérando is located in the Montmartre area in Paris. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a luggage storage and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are also serviced by a lift.

The Gérando’s continental breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room.

Restaurant and bars can be found within walking distance. Hotel Gérando is a 2-minute walk from Anvers Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Sacré-Cœur Basilica and a 14-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge.

This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi

Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels are provided in all of the modern guest rooms at Auberge de la Baie. They are all equipped with en suite bathrooms and hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning.

Free parking is available on site and the city of Avranches is 23 km away. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from the beaches of Saint-Malo and Rennes is reached by car in 1 hour.

hotel_name: Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Rouen, Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection, offers accommodation with a literary theme in honour of the writer Gustave Flaubert. It is located 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included in each of the elegant rooms. All rooms have private bathrooms.

Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests are invited to relax in the hotel's cocktail lounge. The hotel is situated across the street from a number of French and international restaurants.

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

Situated in Ardevon, La Jacotière is a B&B set in a renovated farm with a garden and a furnished terrace offering views of the Mont Saint-Michel, just 3 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

The rooms offer a TV, a desk and wardrobe and a private bathroom with shower. The studio also has a kitchen equipped with microwave and stove.

Breakfast is served in the large dining room. Supermarkets, bars and restaurants serving traditional and international cuisine can be found a 5-minute walk away.

At the B&B, guests have access to guides on excursions to do in the area. There are shuttle services nearby to discover the Mont Saint-Michel. Pontorson Train Station is 8.5 km away, while Saint-Malo and Granville are 46 km away.

hotel_name: Odalys City Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Odalys City Le Havre Centre Gare is situated in Le Havre, 2.4 km from Le Havre Beach and 1.6 km from Le Volcan. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Perret Model Appartment, Saint-Michel's Church and Eglise St-Joseph. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 37 km from the property.

Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Guests can make use of barbecue facilities.

This spacious bed and breakfast will provide guests with a satellite TV, a seating area and a CD player. The kitchenette has a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is a private bathroom with bathrobes and a hair dryer. The property has an outdoor dining area.

The traditional restaurant at the bed and breakfast specialises in French cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch.

For guests with children, Au Petit Paradis provides outdoor play equipment. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings.

Colmar Train Station is 9.1 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 24 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 65 km away.

Featuring free bikes, garden and views of garden, Romantic Studio Vacances is situated in Labaroche, 15 km from House of the Heads. This apartment features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 16 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 16 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 74 km away.

Located in Strasbourg within 900 metres of Strasbourg Christmas Market, City Residence Access Strasbourg features accommodation with a TV and a kitchenette.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

The 'Petite France' is a 12-minute walk from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.2 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

Featuring 3-star accommodation, WS Tour Eiffel - Laos is located in Paris, 1.3 km from Eiffel Tower and 1.7 km from Rodin Museum. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

At the apartment complex, every unit has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Orsay Museum is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.8 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 15 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hôtel De L’ill is located in a one-way street in Strasbourg, halfway between the cathedral and the university. It offers a large terrace and modern guest rooms.

All of the guestrooms feature a flat-screen TV. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in all of the rooms and some of them are air-conditioned.

Hôtel De L’ill features a lounge area where guests can relax.

There are many typical restaurants serving regional specialities in the area.The buffet breakfast served daily also includes regional specialities.

Featuring self-contained accommodation, Le 32 is ideally located in the centre of Strasbourg near the cathedral and the famous Gutenberg square.

The apartments and studios at Le 32 all have a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Each has a dining area and a fully-equipped kitchenette that includes a fridge, a microwave and a Nespresso coffee maker.

The decor is contemporary with fresh white walls and modern furniture.  Most of the rooms have their own private bathroom with a shower.

Conveniently located in the Alsace region, Le 32 is 17 km from Strasbourg airport and 2.5 km from the train station. The property is located in the pedestrian zone and the public parking is located 100 or 250 metres away.

Located between the European Institutions and the City Center, discover the emblematic Art Nouveau district in the streets of Neustadt. Go to the Palais des Congrès or the Parc des Expositions a few minutes walk away.

We are proud to welcome you in an environment respectful of nature, where every detail has been thought of for your comfort. May your stay with us be as pleasant as the sweet fragrance of a flower in full bloom.

Located in Grenoble, La Bulle du Téléphérique provides inner courtyard views and free WiFi, 1.1 km from WTC Grenoble and 5.5 km from AlpExpo. The property is set 1.8 km from Alps Stadium, 1.9 km from The Bastille Grenoble and 5.7 km from Summum. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 800 metres from Grenoble Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Col de Parménie is 33 km from the apartment. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km away.

Offering city views, Les Quais d'Annecy is an accommodation set in Annecy, 36 km from Bourget Lake and 41 km from Stade de Genève. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 35 km from Rochexpo.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a car rental service.

Jet d'Eau is 44 km from Les Quais d'Annecy, while St. Pierre Cathedral is 45 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently situated just 50 metres from the property.

Watersports activities can be found 200 metres away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

Boasting garden views, Villa Bello Visto provides accommodation with barbecue facilities, around 40 km from Digne Golf Course. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and outdoor fireplace.

Guests can take in the views of the mountain from the patio, which also has outdoor furniture. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Continental and Italian breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

You can play tennis at the bed and breakfast, and the area is popular for walking tours. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B offers ski storage space.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, like hiking.

The holiday home with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, like horse riding, windsurfing and canoeing. Mazet 55 Gorges du Verdon has a picnic area and a seasonal outdoor pool.

Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Gorges du Verdon and the Luberon, the Villa Borghese is situated in a park surrounded by 100-year old oak trees. It features a heated outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and a wellness centre.

The intimate rooms feature garden views, air conditioning and a TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bath tub and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The on-site gastronomic restaurant, La Table de Pauline, serves breakfast each morning as well as Provençal cuisine which has been recommended in travel and restaurant guide books. For a relaxed midday meal guests can eat at the Côté Jardin.

A tennis court and sauna are also available on site. Villa Borghese is 14 km from the A51 motorway and 16 km from Manosque. The Aix-en-Provence TGV station is 70 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

hotel_name: Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon
description:

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon you will find a restaurant serving French and Mediterranean cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested.

hotel_name: Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence
description:
Located 500 metres from the village and 800 metres from the thermal baths,Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence consists of 3 small complexes. It includes 3 swimming pools and relaxation facilities.

The apartments at Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence are equipped with a kitchenette including hotplates, a microwave, an oven, and a dishwasher.

The apartments situated on the ground floor boast a private garden and all others feature their own terrace.

Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools and 1 indoor swimming pool. Sports-enthusiasts will appreciate the residence’s fitness centre.

You can also enjoy unwinding in the spa with its hot tub, hammam and sauna.

Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

Villa Thermae is located in Gréoux-les-Bains. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 23 km from Golf du Luberon.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The area is popular for cycling and fishing, and bike hire is available at this 3-star apartment. A casino and a baby safety gate are available at the apartment, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Marseille Provence Airport is 90 km from the property.

hotel_name: Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon
description:

The air-conditioned accommodation is 35 km from Golf du Luberon, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 45 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also provides guests with a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A coffee shop can be found on-site, and in the warmer months you can make use of the barbecue facilities.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allemagne-en-Provence, like bike tours. Snorkelling, hiking and walking tours are possible within the area, and a water park is available on-site.

Marseille Provence Airport is 102 km away.

Certain units in the campground have private entrance and are equipped with wardrobe and outdoor furniture. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

You can play table tennis at this 3-star campground, and the area is popular for hiking and walking tours. The campground has a picnic area and a terrace.

Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, this hotel has a large collection of objects from the 1950's and paintings by Maurice Vagh-Weinmann. It also offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is individually decorated and has free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and views over the valley or the garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on 1 of the 2 terraces with views of the garden.

Activities in the nearby area include cycling, hiking and paragliding. Nautical activities and fishing is possible by Lac de Sainte-Croix, 5 km from the hotel. Les Gorges du Verdon is also 5 km away.

The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and all have air condtioning.

A continental buffet breakfast is served everyday from 7h to 10h. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village centre, Le Colombier is just 5 km from Sainte-Croix Lake. This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court. Free WiFi is provided.

Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks. Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles. Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the campground, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the campground will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Palud sur Verdon, like cycling.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 108 km away.

Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms are located on the 2nd floor and include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A French breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant which is closed every Thursday evening and Friday all day.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

hotel_name: Appart'City Classic Lyon Part Dieu Villette
description:
Appart'City Classic Lyon Part Dieu Villette is located 500 metres from Lyon Part-Dieu Station and just 800 metres from Rue Garibaldi, in Lyon. It offers self-catering accommodation with satellite TV and free WiFi access.

Each apartment at this Appart'City Classic Lyon Part Dieu Villette has a kitchenette, and lift access.

Breakfast is served during weekdays and a laundry service is also available. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

The residence offers private parking on site for an additional fee. Guests of the Appart'City Classic Lyon Part Dieu Villette can travel throughout Lyon from the Dauphiné-Lacassagne Tram Stop nearby. The Groupama Stadium is located a 20-minute drive away, and the Concert Hall Tony Garnier is 30 minutes away by public transport. Part-Dieu Commercial Centre is a 13-minute walk from the property.

Situated in the centre of Lyon, Studio au cœur de Lyon features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property features city views and is 1.3 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre and less than 1 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like walking tours.

Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 1.3 km from Studio au cœur de Lyon, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 2.8 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 31 km away.

Hôtel Villa Berlioz is a 3-star hotel that offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. It is located a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Lyon's Old Town.

At the hotel, every room is air-conditioned and has a desk, a TV with satellite channels, and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Hôtel Villa Berlioz also provide guests with a garden view.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the dining area that offers a garden view or in the comfort of your guestroom.

Hôtel Villa Berlioz is situated in street with many restaurants, a 10-minute walk from the Confluence shopping and entertainment mall, and just 50 metres from the Perrache TGV Station, a Taxi rank and a Car rental agency. It is also a short walk to the Tramway and Subway Stations. A covered car park is located just 100 metres from the Hôtel Villa Berlioz.

Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is equipped with satellite TV and en suite facilities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.

Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Notre Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 2 km away. The Suchet tram stop is just 120 metres from the hotel.

Located opposite Lyon-Perrache TGV Train Station, Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache is a 4-star hotel set in a listed Art Nouveau building, on Lyon Presqu'ile. With free WiFi throughout, it offers a restaurant with a terrace.

All rooms at the property feature a 47 inch flat-screen TV with international channels and a Bluetooth sound system and are fitted with a private bathroom. A Nespresso coffee machine, free soft drinks in the minibar and bathrobes are available in the Privilege rooms.

A hot and cold breakfast buffet with local produce is available daily. It can be served in guestrooms for an extra charge. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage facilities.

Perrache underground station, tram and bus stops are located within 200 metres. Place Bellecour is a 15-minute walk from Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache, while Musée des Confluences is 2 km or 3 tram stops away. Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 37 km away.

Grand Hotel des Terreaux is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île and offers an indoor relaxation pool and rooms with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Set in a 19th century building in historical center of Lyon, between the Rhône and the Saône rivers, this hotel is 350 metres from Hôtel de Ville Metro Station and is located 200 metres from Place des Terreaux.

All rooms are individually decorated. They are serviced by a lift and include a unique decoration and a private bathroom with a shower or a bathtub.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast (only EUR 8 for children 7 - 11 years old) , which guests can enjoy in the dining room, or in their room upon request.  The Grand Hôtel des Terreaux also has a bar where guests can relax with a drink in the evening.

The hotel reception desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area. A wide range of restaurants, bars and cafés is found next to the hotel.

Old Lyon is just 500 metres from the hotel and Lyon Cathedral is 900 metres away. The hotel is 450 metres from Opéra Nouvel and 30 km from Lyon Saint Exupéry Airport. The nearest public car, parking des Terreaux is available at an extra charge, and located a 2-minute walk away from the hotel.

hotel_name: Hamac Suites - Suite Herbouville - Quai du Rhône
description:
Offering city views, Hamac Suites - Suite Herbouville - Quai du Rhône is an accommodation set in Lyon, 1.1 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and 2 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma. The property is around 3.1 km from Part-Dieu Train Station, 3.2 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre and 3.6 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.2 km from the apartment, while Musée des Confluences is 6 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 34 km away.

Set in a historical, Renaissance building, Hôtel Le Boulevardier is located in central Lyon, less than 300 metres from Cordeliers Metro Station. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms have exposed wooden beams and stone walls.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guest can have a drink on the onsite bar. Many shops and restaurants can be found nearby.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Place des Terreaux and Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and within a 10-minute walk away from the old town. Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 30 km away. The nearest public car park, Saint Antoine is 200 metres away and available at extra cost.

hotel_name: Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable
description:
Boasting garden views, Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable features accommodation with a shared lounge and a balcony, around less than 1 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.2 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma.

The kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like walking tours. Guests at Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 5.4 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 23 km away.

hotel_name: Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection
description:
Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection is located in central Lyon on the Presqu’Ile, 450 metres from the Lyon Perrache TGV Train Station. It offers en suite rooms with satellite TV and high-speed WiFi.

Set within a former private mansion dating from 1882, Hotel De Verdun 1882 provides a daily buffet breakfast.

Hotel De Verdun 1882 has a 24-hour front desk and security guard.

Guests have easy access to the city’s many shops and restaurants. Place Bellecour is a 10 minute walk away and Vieux Lyon is 1.5 km from the hotel.

Located in the centre of Lyon, just 600 metres from the Tête d’Or Theatre, Maison Hôtel offers self-catering duplex cottages. Foch Metro Station is ideally located 50 metres away.

The cottages are set on 2 levels and feature a living area with a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a bathroom. The kitchen includes a microwave, stove and dishwasher.

Grocery shops and restaurants can be found within 200 metres and an interior patio is accessible by both cottages. The Fine Arts Museum is a 13-minute walk away and Part-Dieu Train Station is 2 km from the accommodation.

Located in the centre of Lyon, 140 metres from Place des Jacobins and 400 metres from Place Bellecour, Best Western Lyon Saint-Antoine offers accommodation with free WiFi. The hotel reception is run by multilingual staff and is open 24-hours a day.

All rooms feature a safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room has its own private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests will also find a welcome tray in each of the rooms.

A breakfast buffet can be enjoyed daily either in the dinning area or in your room. Breakfast includes a selection of fresh, local products including organic and gluten free options. An express take-away breakfast is also available upon request.

Best Western Lyon Saint-Antoine is just 500 metres from the Bellecour Metro station, making it easy to explore the city. The nearest public parking, parking des Célestins, is available within a 5-minute walk, at an extra charge.

 Please note that there is no A/C in the appartment.

 Please note that the hotel is 100% NON-smoking. Any triggering of the fire alarme due to cigarette smoke is liable to a penalty of 190€.

 Please note that a pre-authorization can be made to guarantee your stay. Also, the payment can be asked at arrival.

Please note that the elevator stops at the middle floor. There are a few steps to access the rooms. The staff is at your disposal for any help.

hotel_name: Cosy appartement, dans les pentes de la Croix Rousse
description:
Situated in the centre of Lyon, Cosy appartement, dans les pentes de la Croix Rousse features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property is around 2.7 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre, 4.1 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 5.3 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Musée des Confluences is 7.2 km from the apartment and Eurexpo is 18 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, Musée Miniature et Cinéma and Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 36 km from the property.

Situated in Lyon, 200 metres from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Fourvière is 3.1 km away.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers a continental buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen. The terrace is only open during the breakfast service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.9 km from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 2.4km from the property. Perrache Train Station is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units have a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 32 km away.

hotel_name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône
description:
Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access. It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station.

Set over 8 floors, rooms at Campanile are decorated in a simple style and feature air conditioning. Please note that only the TV in the bar broadcasts satellite channels and Canal+. The private bathrooms are complete with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Four of the guest rooms are adapted for wheelchair access.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and an express check-in service. Free newspapers are available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street. The A6 and A7 are a 5-minute drive away.

Located in Lyon, 1.9 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe.

Guests at TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.5 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 34 km from the property.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located in the centre of Lyon, between the Rhône and Saône Rivers in the heart of the Presqu'île district. It offers fully equipped studios and apartments with free WiFi access.

Each apartment and studio at Citadines Presqu'île Lyon has a safety deposit box, ironing facilities and satellite TV. The kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, dishwasher and toaster. Bed linen and towels are provided. Some units have air conditioning.

For an additional cost, a buffet breakfast is available daily in the breakfast room. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day. There is a launderette on site offering a dry-cleaning service at a supplement.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located 450 metres from Cordeliers Bourse Metro Station. Vieux Lyon is a 6-minute walk away, while Place Bellecour is 500 metres from the property. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 13-minute drive away. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge and is subject to availability.

Located in Lyon, Hotel Saint Vincent offers accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lyon National Opera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All of its rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Free toiletries are also provided. An iron is available upon request.

Breakfast is available daily at a supplement. Hotel Saint Vincent also offers newspapers, luggage storage facilities and a 24-hour front desk. Bars and restaurants can be found less than 100 metres from the property.

Hotel Saint Vincent is located 50 metres from the River Saône and 600 metres from Lyon's Museum of Fine Arts. Lyon Perrache Train Station is an 18-minute drive away. A public paying car park is available a 5-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache
description:
Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache is located in Lyon, on the 2nd floor of a building. Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km away and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms have a shower. Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

hotel_name: 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique
description:
In the 2nd arr. District of Lyon, close to the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is set 1.3 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and offers a lift. The property is 600 metres from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with slippers. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Guests at 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like cycling.

Fourviere Roman Theatre is 1 km from the accommodation, while Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 1.3 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km from the property.

hotel_name: Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Situated 3.5 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu offers accommodation with a balcony. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The property is fitted with an indoor pool and is set 500 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

At the aparthotel, the units include a desk and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings and Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu can arrange a bicycle rental service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

Located in the heart of Lyon, on the Presqu’île District, Republik Hotel offers accommodation with a 24-hour reception and free WiFi. Place Bellecour and Bellecour Metro Station are both 230 metres from the property.

Each air-conditioned room comes with a kettle, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and is fitted with a bath or a shower. A baby cot can be added to the room upon request and subject to prior approval from the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning, including bread, pastries, cereal, cold meat, cheese, jam, hot drinks and fruit juice. A range of amenities including shops, bars and restaurants are available within 200 metres of the property.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within a 15-minute walk from Republik Hotel, while the Cordliers district is 600 metres away. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.2 km away. Public parking is available a 2-minute walk away.

Conveniently located in the centre of Lyon, Keystone Hôtel & Spa is within less than 1 km of Lyon Perrache Train Station and a 15-minute walk of Musée des Confluences. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with a sauna, and hot tub, as well as a terrace.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Italian.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 2.9 km from Keystone Hôtel & Spa, while Fourviere Roman Theatre is 3.6 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available at the property.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The apartment with a balcony and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Gare de Cornavin is 46 km from the apartment, while Halle Olympique d'Albertville is 46 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km from the property.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Stade de Genève is 41 km from the apartment, while Jet d'Eau is 45 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km away.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in your guest room or in the hotel’s dining room.

You can also park your car in the hotel’s private parking with an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

Annecy Casino is 300 meters away, and a public beach is 300 metres away from the property.

A traditional restaurant is available for lunch and dinner on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturday and Sundays for lunch only

Located in the centre of Annecy, within 37 km of Rochexpo and 38 km of Bourget Lake, ALTAI Annecy Rent Lodge is an accommodation offering city views. The property is set 43 km from Stade de Genève, 46 km from Jet d'Eau and 46 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. The apartment provides an outdoor fireplace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

The property is located 41 km from Stade de Genève, 45 km from Jet d'Eau and 45 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes. Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

Our hotel has an elevator, starting from the 1st floor where stands the reception desk and serves 2nd and 3rd  .
There will be some more stairs to climb to get to  the 1st floor and the 4th. Please do not hesitate to ask for help upon arrival/departure.

hotel_name: Le Pura Vida, Hyper centre Terrasse + Parking
description:
Located 33 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake in the centre of Annecy, Le Pura Vida, Hyper centre Terrasse + Parking provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 38 km from Stade de Genève.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

hotel_name: Le Splendid Hotel Lac D'Annecy - Handwritten Collection
description:
The property is facing the lake of Annecy and located in the centre of the old town of Annecy, a couple of paces of the shopping streets. We are also close to the cinemas, theatre and the best restaurants.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find us on the banks of the Vassé canal, facing the lawn of Champ de Mars, next to the Pier for the lake tour in boat and beach at 200 metres. A fitness room is available.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Nord are all non-smoking and air-conditioned. They come with en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel du Nord.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

There is free overnight parking nearby. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 35 km from the property.

Breakfast is available for an additional charge at the property and can be enjoyed in the guest's room or on the terrace, weather permitting

The lake can be found a 15-minute walk away. The hotel is just a 30-minute drive from Geneva and the Swiss border.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

A breakfast is served each morning in the property’s former wine cellar. Guests can also relax in the adjacent, communal living area and or on the outdoor terrace, which has a view of the interior courtyard.

Activities such as hiking, mountain biking and Christmas markets are popular in the area. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 57 meters away.

2 apartments for up to 4 guests

The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms include a private bathroom and a bath. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Besançon Viotte train station is 4.3 km away and Franche-Comté TGV train station is 8.7 km away. Micropolis is 8 km from Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

Situated a few steps from the Besançon train station and just 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Foch offers quality comfort at an affordable price.

This charming hotel provides a panoramic view of downtown from its well-equipped guestrooms. Rooms feature shower or bath, TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Hotel Foch also provides 24-hour reception, a car park just 20 metres from the hotel, a bar area and a buffet breakfast. 

Besançon is located close to the Swiss border and is the capital of the Doubs department in the region of Franche-Comté.

hotel_name: Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Built in 2010, this 3-star hotel is within 4.4 km of Besançon-Mouillère train station and 5.7 km of Micropolis. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon, while Besançon Vesoul University is 1.2 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 61 km away.

Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

At the hotel, all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 7.7 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin, while Micropolis is 10 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 59 km away.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

hotel_name: Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo
description:
Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo provides accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Besançon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This apartment features free private parking and a minimarket. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a private bathroom and have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like cycling, fishing and hiking. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Dole-Jura Airport is 64 km away.

Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views. The units feature a wardrobe.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Régina.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon. It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban.  The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

Offering a terrace and mountain view, Appartements Residilaverde Gare is situated in Grenoble, 300 metres from Grenoble Train Station and 600 metres from WTC Grenoble. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

AlpExpo is 5.7 km from the apartment, while Alps Stadium is 2.5 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km away.

The property is around 6.6 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 1.4 km from Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Best Western Hotel Fontaine Argent include Besancon Viotte Train Station, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Time museum of Besançon. Dole-Jura Airport is 64 km from the property.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

hotel_name: Hôtel particulier de 1734 - avec Parking - Plein centre-ville
description:
Located less than 1 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and a 13-minute walk from Besancon Viotte Train Station in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel particulier de 1734 - avec Parking - Plein centre-ville provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon, Time museum of Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. Dole-Jura Airport is 63 km away.

Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the inner courtyard views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from L'Amour d'Or Centre Historique.

This hotel is set in the heart of Besançon, just 700 metres from the banks of the Doubs River. Guests have free Wi-Fi internet access and are invited to relax in the hotel's lounge bar.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each of the simply decorated guest rooms. The rooms are serviced by a lift and include en suite bathrooms.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast, including fresh orange juice and regional specialities, can be enjoyed in Hotel du Nord's breakfast area.

The Church of Sainte-Madeleine is a 10-minute walk away and the Besançon-Viotte Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. The Besançon Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology is just 450 metres away.

A bike box is available on site, free of charge for bikes, charges may apply for motorbikes.

hotel_name: Comfort Aparthotel Besancon Hauts du Chazal
description:

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris. A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

hotel_name: Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle
description:
Set in the centre of Besançon, just 1.2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle offers accommodation with inner courtyard views and free WiFi. Located around 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station, the apartment is also 5.7 km away from Besançon Vesoul University. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle.

Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

This Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is located in Besançon and offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access. It is next to the Doubs River and 2 km from the town’s train station.

Accommodation at the Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

The Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 1.5 km from the Cathedral Saint-Jean. A Tramway Station can be reached within a 2-minute walk and provides direct access to Besançon Viotte Train Station.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

hotel_name: Mercure Besancon Parc Micaud - Hotel & Bar
description:
This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park.

Guests can enjoy a hike along the Doubs, or enjoy a boat cruise.

There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, all non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV.

L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00.

There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.

Conveniently located in a park, ibis Styles Besançon is a 15-minute walk from the TGV Train Station and the centre of Besançon. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and contemporary in style. They include an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant. A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

Providing free private parking, the property has a 24-hour reception. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Parc des Expositions Micropolis and just 3.7 km away from Citadel of Besançonet, which is one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels. The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water. Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

This residence offers comfortable, self catering accommodation. It is in a quiet road in the city centre, a 5-minute walk from the historic Petite France district and Strasbourg Cathedral.

The studios at the Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber are equipped with free wired Internet and accessible by lift. They also have a flat-screen TV, work desk and a private bathroom. All studios have a fully equipped kitchenette.

Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber is accessible by car and a public car park is just 2 minutes away. It is well-linked by the tram to the rest of the city and just a 10-minute walk to the train station.

The Hotel des Tonneliers - Restaurant La Cruche is in a very central location, 450 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from Strasbourg Train Station. It offers free WiFi throughout the property. In summer there is an outdoor terrace.

The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a toilet and a bath or a shower. They also include a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

La Cruche D’or is just a short walk from the picturesque Petite France district. It is also close to the famous Palais des Rohan museum.

Located next to Place Kléber, this Citadines Apart'hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station. It offers fully-furnished apartments serviced by an elevator and equipped with free Wi-Fi access.

Apartments at the Citadines Apart'hotel Strasbourg Kléber feature a flat-screen TV, DVD player and desk in the seating area. They each have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher and linen and towels are provided.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room.

Private parking is available on site at an additional cost. The hotel also has a launderette and offers a dry-cleaning service.

Strasbourg Cathedral and the Petite France area of the city are a 5-minute walk from the aparthotel. The Alsace Museum is 750 metres away.

hotel_name: Carpe Diem Home - Au pied de la Cathédrale
description:
Located a 1-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 700 metres from the Petite France district, Carpe Diem Home offers accommodation with a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Located on an upper floor and accessed by stairs, each unit has a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, as well as a microwave and kettle.

Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna, or enjoy city views.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All units feature a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Hotel Arok offers a sun terrace.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.3 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

Okko Hotels Strasbourg Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. They also have a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge. Every evening, we invite you to join us at the Club to experience a moment of greed and conviviality around the guest table: the aperitivo, composed of a selection of local products, often organic and always good.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property. Guests can also access a sauna and a fitness area for free and buy local products in the on-site shop. Computers are at guests' disposal in the business area.

The Botanical Gardens is 1.8 km from Okko Hotels Strasbourg Centre, while St. Paul's Church and  Strasbourg Cathedral are 1.9 km away. The property is also 1.5 km from Strasbourg History Museum. Strasbourg International Airport is 16 km from the property.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau
description:

The air-conditioned rooms at ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a walk-in shower. A flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BeIn sport channels is provided.

The Strasbourg Entzeim airport is 18 km away while Europa Park is 55 km away from the hotel.

The guest rooms at ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France include a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. They each have a telephone, a work desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Newspapers and luggage storage are available for free on site.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 800 metres from the hotel and Place Kléber is 650 metres away. The property is 130 metres from Faubourg National Tram Stop and 16 km from Strasbourg Airport.

Boasting a shared lounge, Ibis Budget Strasbourg Centre Republique is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 700 metres from St. Paul's Church and 1.2 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre. With a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at Ibis Budget Strasbourg Centre Republique.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include European Parliament, Strasbourg Cathedral and Strasbourg History Museum. Strasbourg International Airport is 12 km from the property.

EtC…Hôtel is in Strasbourg near the Petite France district. It offers modern guestrooms and a peaceful environment.

All of the guestrooms are equipped with private bathrooms, flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. The entire hotel is non-smoking.

Breakfast is served daily in the pleasant dining area from 07:00 to 10:00.

The central location of the EtC...Hôtel puts you just 400 metres from the famous Strasbourg Cathedral located in the heart of the city.

Located in the centre of Strasbourg, just 200 metres from Strasbourg History Museum and 1.3 km from St. Paul's Church, Strasbourg Centre Epine provides accommodation with inner courtyard views and free WiFi. The 4-star apartment is 400 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg.

European Parliament is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 4.4 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km from the property.

hotel_name: Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte & Restaurant Louisiane
description:
Set near the River Ill, Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane is 2 km from the historic district. It features a restaurant with a summer terrace and a garden.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

Regional specialities are served in restaurant La Louisiane and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 06:30 until 11:00 at Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

This Hotel offers a free private parking lot on site.
 Strasbourg Golf Club is 15 km from the hotel. Strasbourg International Airport is only 19 km away.

Please note that pets cannot be left alone in the rooms.

Please note that hotel rules are applicable for all reservations. Any stay involve the acceptation of the hotel rules, this guide of rules is available on request at the reception.

From the reception woodworks to stylishly rooms, Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare Bristol, Strasbourg Centre Gare provides a pleasant setting for family and leisure time as well as for business trips. It features 33 non smoking, soundproofed and air conditioned rooms, of which 2 are for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is served daily in the communal lounge. It consists of orange juice, hot drinks, fruit compote, cheese, cold meats, eggs, croissants, bread, jam, butter and local products.

The hotel also benefits from a central location from which you can easily discover the city and its amazing architectural and cultural heritage.

The Hotel Suisse has a central location just behind Strasbourg Cathedral. It offers family-run accommodation with free WiFi access and a summer terrace. The historic Petite France district is just a 10-minute walk away

Guest rooms at the Hotel Suisse are equipped with en suite facilities, a TV, telephone.
As our hotel is a 14th century building, our rooms do not dispose of air-conditioning, but we provide fans in every room.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a view of the cathedral’s steeple. All rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The property has a 24-hour front desk.

With free private parking, the property is 13 km from House of the Heads and 13 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is non-smoking and is located 14 km from Colmar Expo.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a cable flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 72 km away.

The property is around 40 km from Strasbourg History Museum, 41 km from House of the Heads and 42 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This holiday home comes with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a bath. Offering free private parking, this 2-star holiday home also features free WiFi.

The holiday home features a children's playground and a barbecue.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 42 km from Claude, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 43 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 43 km from the property.

This stylish air-conditioned hotel is located in the West of Paris, 400 metres from the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern rooms, decorated with warm colours.

The rooms at Star Champs-Elysées are also equipped with satellite TV, a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. You can relax in the hotel’s lounge, which features a medieval décor and period fireplace.

Star Champs Elysées welcomes you 24/7 with multilingual staff. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and there is a laundry service.

Hotel Star Champs-Elysées is 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro and RER Station, which provide direct access to Disneyland, La Defense, The Louvre Museum and the Montmartre district. The famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées is less than 10 minutes away on foot.

The hotel offers 3 types of breakfast every morning :

The full buffet breakfast, served in our breakfast room at 23€ per day and per person.
The breakfast served directly in your room, at 19€ per day and per person (this is the formula proposed for our bed and breakfast rates).
The express breakfast which can be taken away, at 9€ per day and per person.

Offering a casino and garden view, Gîte du Vignoble is situated in Beblenheim, 9.1 km from Colmar Expo and 13 km from House of the Heads. This holiday home features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Outdoor seating is also available at the holiday home.

A private entrance leads guests into the holiday home, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This holiday home is non-smoking and soundproof.
