hotel_name: Hôtel du Haut Koenigsbourg- entre vignes et château
description:
This hotel de charme offers en suite accommodation within the Ballons des Vosges Regional Park. It is situated in the scenic village of Thannenkirch, in the Alsace region.

Garden views are available from the bright guest rooms, which have queen-size beds. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in all rooms. Private bathrooms are equipped with amenities and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken on the terrace in warmer weather.

Guests at Haut Koenigsbourg have access to a lounge with a TV, video games and a range of books. Free Wi-Fi is accessible from this lounge.

Haut Koenigsbourg Chateau is 7.1 km from the hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is 10 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

This Best Western hotel is located 10 minutes from Montparnasse Train Station and the Montparnasse Tower. Free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV feature in the air-conditioned guest rooms.

A mini-fridge and tea and coffee making facilities are included in each room. All of the rooms have a classic décor and include a hairdryer in the private bathroom.

Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room at Bretagne Montparnasse hotel.

Pernety Metro station is 300 metres away, providing direct access to the Champs Elysées. Orly Airport is just a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

Paris Italie is ideally located for sightseeing in Paris. It is close to the Latin Quarter, the famous Rue Mouffetard and the Butte aux Cailles. It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned rooms at the Paris Italie includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

This property has a 24-hour front desk service and it is situated next to Italie 2 shopping centre.

Its central location allows for easy access to all of the city's sought-after tourist destinations whether on foot or using public transport such as, Place d’Italie Metro Station, which is 120 metres from Paris Italie. AccorHotels Arena is located 1.9 km from the property.

The France Albion is a 24-hour reception hotel with free WiFi and luggage storage. It is located a 10-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayettes Shopping Centre and from Opera Garnier.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and wardrobe. The en-suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is available daily in the cellar.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Notre-Dame-de-Lorette metro Station which provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

hotel_name: Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris
description:
Set in Paris, 600 metres from Sainte-Chapelle and 1.4 km from Orsay Museum, Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property has city views and is 1.9 km from Musée de l'Orangerie and less than 1 km from Louvre Museum. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Luxembourg Gardens.

The apartment consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Notre Dame Cathedral, Tuileries Garden and Pompidou Centre. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris.

Located in the heart of Paris in the 11th district, Hôtel Paris Voltaire is just a 13-minute walk from the famous Place des Vosges. It offers an elevator, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast serving orange juice, hot drinks, French pastries, jam and cheese is available every morning in the breakfast room at Hôtel Paris Voltaire.

Voltaire Metro Station is ideally located a 3-minute walk away and allows direct access to the Grands Boulevards and Galeries Lafayette. Place de la Bastille is a 12-minute walk from the hotel.

WS Opéra - Duphot features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Paris, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Popular points of interest nearby include Musée de l'Orangerie, Tuileries Garden and Orsay Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near WS Opéra - Duphot include Opéra Garnier, Louvre Museum and Gare Saint-Lazare. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotel_name: Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA
description:
Situated in Paris and with Pompidou Centre reachable within 1.6 km, Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. The hotel provides an indoor pool, sauna and room service.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle.

Guests at Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Gare de l'Est is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Gare du Nord is 2.1 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

Situated in central Paris near Place de la République and with an art deco façade, Hôtel Gabriel Paris features room service, a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk.

With an uncluttered Zen atmosphere and contemporary decor, this luxurious boutique hotel offers a private and elegant setting to create a quiet sense of relaxation.

Guest rooms are stylishly decorated and equipped with modern en suite facilities including a flat-screen TV, an iPod dock and free, unlimited Wi-Fi access. Rooms are also equipped with a Night Cove digital sleep aide.

The bar lounge captures a surrealist decor.

République Metro Station is just 350 metres away, providing direct access to the Opéra Garnier.

hotel_name: Vintage Paris Gare du Nord by Hiphophostels
description:
Set in the 9th district, this air-conditioned hotel is located just 500 metres from Gare du Nord Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge. Vintage Hostel Gare du Nord has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi.

Each guest room has a private bathroom and feature a LCD TV. A free fitness room is at your disposal on site.

Anvers Metro Station is 250 metres away, providing direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. Saint-Pierre fabric market is just 450 metres from the hotel and the Sacré-Coeur Basilique is a 10-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
description:
Situated just 300 metres from Gare de Lyon TGV Train, RER and Metro Stations in central Paris, this air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception and ticket service. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided. A vending machine selling drinks is located at reception.

Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located just 500 metres from the banks of the River Seine. The trendy nightlife of Bastille is a 10-minute walk away. Public parking is available nearby.

Breakfast is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor from 7am to 10.30 am. An "express" breakfast formula including 1 hot drink, 1 fruit juice and 2 viennoiseries is also available (to request to the hotel).

hotel_name: Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est
description:
Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est is located in the 10th arr. District of Paris, 1.6 km from La Cigale Concert Hall, 700 metres from Gare de l'Est and 1.7 km from Pigalle Metro Station. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 1958, you will have access to free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Gare du Nord.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Sacré-Coeur is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Pompidou Centre is 3.4 km from the property. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 20 km away.

Midway between the Latin Quarter and Bibliothèque François Mitterrand, this Citadines Austerlitz Paris is a 3-minute walk from the Campo Formio Métro station. It is a 10-minute walk from Gare d'Austerlitz.

Citadines Apart'hôtel Austerlitz features 50 apartments, including studios and a 2-room apartment. They all have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The spacious and luminous breakfast room looks out onto the garden where the terrace is set in the summertime.

The Citadines Apart'hôtel offers a business centre with free Wi-Fi access, a laundry room and on-site car park with spaces subject to availability. Place d'Italie and Jardin des Plantes are both a 10-minute walk away.

The Garden Saint Martin is located next to Paris’s Canal Saint-Martin. It is just 1.5km from Gare du Nord and offers free WiFi internet access.

The Garden Saint Martin offers rooms with a TV and a private bathroom. Some guest rooms also have a view of the hotel's patio.

A continental breakfast is served daily and the Garden Saint Martin also provides a 24-hour reception.

The Garden Hotel is located a 5-minute walk from Republique Metro Station which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier, Place de la Concorde and the Champs-Elysées.

This hotel is located in Paris’s Bastille district, 100 metres from the Gare de Lyon, in a quiet street. It offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and private bathrooms.

Guests of the Hotel Du Midi can relax in the TV room or the lounge, which have internet access.

Additional services include a 24-hour reception.

Maison Traversière is a few minutes’ walk from the Bastille, Opera Bastille, the Seine and the Place des Vosges.

Providing free WiFi throughout the property, HOTEL FORMIO is situated in Paris, 2.2 km from Luxembourg Gardens and 2.8 km from Sainte-Chapelle. The property is around 2.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 2.9 km from Opéra Bastille and 4.4 km from Pompidou Centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL FORMIO also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available daily at HOTEL FORMIO.

Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Rodin Museum is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 4.6 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km from the property.

Located opposite Gare du Nord Train Station, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Sacre-Coeur and the Montmartre district of the city are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Each soundproofed guest room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms at Hotel Flanelles Paris offer an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Additional services offered include a 24-hour reception desk and a luggage storage room.

The hotel is located 1 km from Canal Saint-Martin and 1.5 km from Place de la République. Gare du Nord Metro Station offers direct access to Notre-Dame Cathedral.

Located on the left bank in central Paris, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the departure point of the Bateaux Mouches cruise boats. It has a 24-hour reception and a lounge with a computer and marble flooring.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a mini fridge, cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a bathroom including a hairdryer at hotel Beaugrenelle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room at Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Dupleix Metro Station is 240 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées, the Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse Railway Station.

In an 18th-century building in the historic 6th district, this elegant hotel (25 rooms) offers air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Odéon Metro Station is 800 ft away.

Satellite TV and a minibar are available in each soundproofed room. Guest rooms have a romantic décor with pastel colors. Some rooms feature a view of Rue de Buci. Enjoy a continental breakfast every morning in the vaulted cellar at Le Regent.

After breakfast, guests can relax in the lounge, which has marble floors and antique furnishings. With a 24-hour front desk, hotel Le Regent provides a tour desk and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Eugène-Delacroix Museum is 1000 ft away. An airport shuttle service is available upon request

Set in the heart of Opéra, just a few minutes from a chic shopping area including the famous Galeries Lafayette, the theatres district and lively Montmartre. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned rooms at the New Hotel Opéra have displays of unique artwork which are painted by a local artist. They also feature a private bathroom and satellite on a flat-screen TV. The roof-top room has wooden floors with views over Paris.

Newhotel has facilities such as a 24-hour front desk, an elevator that gives access to all rooms and a terrace with a garden that guests can enjoy breakfast on during the summer.

New Hotel Opéra is located in a calm street near the Casino de Paris and Sacré Cœur. It is 140 metres to Metro Station Liege and 750 metres to Metro Station Saint-Lazare, so guests can discover the rest of Paris.

Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera is located in the lively neighborhood of the Grands Boulevards, next to the theatres and 300 metres from Grand Rex cinema. The Grévin Museum is 650 metres away while Opéra Garnier is 1.6 km away.

The hotel has air-conditioned rooms, a Grand Salon and meeting rooms.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning.

The Pompidou Centre is 1.7 km from Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera and famous shops such as the Galeries Lafayette can be found 1.4 km away.

Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property.

Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost.

Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute. Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

hotel_name: Gites les 2 Clos au pied du Mont
description:
Situated in Pontorson, 8.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Gites les 2 Clos au pied du Mont features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and barbecue facilities. The property has garden views and is 8.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. The holiday home has private entrance.

All units are fitted with a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the holiday home, units include bed linen and towels.

Granville Train Station is 45 km from the holiday home, while Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km away.

T2 Confort Sillon St Malo is a beachfront property situated in Saint Malo, 700 metres from Sillon Beach and 1.4 km from Rochebonne Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is located 2 km from Eventail Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 2 bathrooms with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Palais du Grand Large is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 1.9 km from the property.

Well set in the 15th arr. District of Paris, Sublim by Sweett is located 1.6 km from Rodin Museum, 2.4 km from Orsay Museum and 2.4 km from Eiffel Tower. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. Tuileries Garden is 3.3 km from the hotel and Sainte-Chapelle is 3.4 km away.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, all units at Sublim by Sweett have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Luxembourg Gardens is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.9 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 14 km from the property.

hotel_name: Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo
description:
Offering city views, Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo is an accommodation located in Saint Malo, 1.8 km from Bas-Sablons Beach and 1.3 km from Palais du Grand Large. It is situated 1.3 km from Eventail Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Sillon Beach.

The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo, National Fort and Grand Bé.

hotel_name: Les Sablons - Très Bel Appartement , Lumineux
description:
Located in the centre of Saint Malo, just 90 metres from Bas-Sablons Beach and 1.4 km from Mole Beach, Les Sablons - Très Bel Appartement, Lumineux provides accommodation with sea views and free WiFi. The property is set 2.6 km from Palais du Grand Large, 2.9 km from National Fort and 8.1 km from Port-Breton Park. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux.

The 2-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

At the apartment, the modern restaurant is open for dinner and lunch and serves French cuisine.

Guests at Les Sablons - Très Bel Appartement, Lumineux will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint Malo, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Solidor Tower, Grand Bé and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

Offering a snack bar and free WiFi, ibis Styles Saint Malo Port is located in Saint Malo, less than a 10-minute walk from the sandy beaches and 1 km from Saint-Malo Train Station. Emerald Coast is located 2 km from the property.

Each of the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. They all have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

At ibis Styles Saint Malo Port you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and a private parking with a supplement.

The hotel is only 1 km from the Ferry Terminal du Naye and close to the pier, providing access to the Channel Islands. It is also a 5-minute walk from the Olympic swimming pool of Saint Malo. Rennes Airport is 67 km away and the famous Mont Saint-Michel is less than an hour away by car. Dinard is 10 km away.

Located just 150 metres from the beach in Saint-Malo, Hotel De La Mer offers free WiFi access throughout and an on-site bar. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and heating. Each room has a private bathroom that includes a bath and free toiletries.

In July and August, a continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel De La Mer. From September to June, it is served from Tuesday to Saturday. Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

Saint-Malo Port is 2 km away and Espace Duguay Trouin Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the property. Naye Ferry Terminal is 2.4 km away.

Offering a garden and garden view, les Tulipes is situated in Antrain, 22 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 36 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 22 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The bed and breakfast is fitted with a cable flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available.

Port of Houle is 46 km from the bed and breakfast, while Anatole France Metro Station is 48 km from the property.

hotel_name: Chez Léon - Appt à 500m des plages
description:
Set 300 metres from Bon Secours Beach and 500 metres from Eventail Beach in the centre of Saint Malo, Chez Léon - Appt à 500m des plages offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. It is located 400 metres from Grand Bé and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Mole Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

Providing a direct access to the Sillon Beach, Hôtel Ar Iniz offers a regional restaurant, a bar and a terrace with a view of the sea. The modern-style hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre.

The elegant rooms at Hôtel Ar Iniz have a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a safety deposit box. The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and the restaurant on site serves dishes made with fresh and local products. Additional facilities are available such as free WiFi access and bicycle rental.

The property is located 12 km from Cancale and its beaches and a 45-minute drive from the city of Rennes. The train station is 3 km away and there is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost

hotel_name: Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel
description:
Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel, a property with barbecue facilities, is located in Pontorson, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, 46 km from Granville Train Station, as well as 47 km from Champrepus Zoo. Situated 8.7 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, the property features a garden and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is set 8.7 km from Mont Saint-Michel.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Pontorson, like hiking.

Granville's Marina is 47 km from Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel, while Port of Houle is 48 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km away.

hotel_name: Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit is situated in Beauvoir, 5.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The property offers soundproof units and is set 5.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, the units include bed linen and towels.

Guests can enjoy fresh pastries during the à la carte breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beauvoir, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Port of Houle is 44 km from Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit, while Granville Train Station is 47 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km away.

Featuring quiet street views, gites 2 beauvoir provides accommodation with a balcony, around 5.7 km from Mont Saint-Michel. Housed in a building dating from 1900, this apartment is 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 45 km from Port of Houle. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.7 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Granville Train Station is 48 km from the apartment, while The Pointe du Grouin is 49 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km from the property.

Featuring a bar and views of inner courtyard, Le Marquis De La Guintre is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in Courtils, 12 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. Housed in a building dating from 18th century, this bed and breakfast is 12 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 17 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is equipped with a private bathroom.

At the bed and breakfast, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and high tea and serves Grill BBQ cuisine.

Granville Train Station is 42 km from Le Marquis De La Guintre, while Champrepus Zoo is 43 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 90 km from the property.

hotel_name: Les Pommiers de Mont Saint Michel
description:
Les Pommiers de Mont Saint Michel, a property with a bar, is set in Beauvoir, 6.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, 6.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. Featuring full-day security, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a sun terrace. Free private parking is available and the campground also offers bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. Dining options are available close to the campground.

For guests with children, Les Pommiers de Mont Saint Michel features kids pool, an indoor play area and outdoor play equipment. Guests can enjoy the indoor pool at the accommodation.

Port of Houle is 46 km from Les Pommiers de Mont Saint Michel, while Granville Train Station is 48 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 87 km from the property.

hotel_name: Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2
description:
Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2, a property with barbecue facilities, is located in Pontorson, 8.3 km from Mont Saint-Michel, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 45 km from Granville Train Station. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The property is non-smoking and is set 8.3 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy hiking and walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2, while Granville's Marina is 47 km away.

Set in a renovated Breton-style house, this family-run B&B is located in Beauvoir, 3 km from Mont-Saint-Michel. With a 3000-m2 flowered park, it features en suite rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi.

All with a private entrance, the elegant rooms at Les Vieilles Digues have free toiletries. Those on the ground floor include French doors with direct access to the patio, which has deck chairs.

The breakfast includes hot drinks, orange juice, yogurt, cheese and cereals and fresh baguettes are delivered daily by the local baker. The owners are at guests’ disposal for advising good restaurants nearby.

Guests are invited to have a walk or a ride along Le Couesnon River, which is 200 metres from Les Vieilles Digues. Saint-Malo and Cancale are a 45-minute drive and Pontorson Train Station is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

hotel_name: Apparthôtel Mont Saint Michel - Résidence Fleurdumont
description:
Résidence Fleurdumont offers pet-friendly accommodation in Beauvoir. Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 4.4 km away. Résidence Fleurdumont also includes a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court and a pétanque playground. Free private parking is available on site.

Most units include a terrace or balcony. Résidence Fleurdumont features free WiFi and TV. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave, a refrigerator and stovetop, as well as a coffee machine. A breakfast kit is provided every morning.

The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 42 km from Résidence Fleurdumont.

Chez Adèle, a property with water sports facilities, is situated in Le Mont Saint Michel, 200 metres from Mont Saint-Michel, 29 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 49 km from Port of Houle. The property is non-smoking and is located 100 metres from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The recently renovated holiday home includes 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, as well as a coffee machine. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

The Auberge Saint Pierre is made up of small 14th century half-timbered houses located on the island of Mont-Saint-Michel. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts, including a TV and free Wi-Fi.

Ideally located for visiting Mont-Saint-Michel, this hotel is on the main street which leads to the Mont-Saint-Michel abbey.

Two annexes of the hotel are located in the middle of the village and are accessible by numerous stairs.

The rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre and the annexes have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms offer sea views.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Norman cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and you can choose to dine on site.

Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche will be happy to accommodate you.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel.

At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed. Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey. It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale. Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel. The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant. A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel. Avranches is a 23-minute drive away. Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV. Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine.

Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 7 km away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station. It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24 hour-a-day food service.

Guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV and some of them offer a sea view. Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

Free of charge guests have at their disposal a PC with internet access and a printer. Bikes can be rented on site.

Breakfast is served every morning, and evening meals can be enjoyed at the hotel. Snacks are available throughout the day and packed lunches for picnics are also available.

Hotel Elizabeth, situated in the historic Ship Owners district inside the walls of Saint-Malo offers an atmosphere of yesterday with the modern comforts of today. Saint-Malo Marina is 180 metres away.

Guestrooms are distributed among 2 buildings, Les Armateurs, which includes the superior rooms and Les Skippers, 50 metres away, with the standard rooms. The former was built in the early 17th century and the latter is a more modern building. All rooms are comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Free Wi-Fi internet in the entire property. In the stone-walled cellar, enjoy your breakfast under 400 year old exposed wooden beams.

In the vicinity of Hotel Elizabeth you will find the 18th-century House of Pirates, Saint Servan, the city of Aleth, and the museum of Cap Horniers. You can also enjoy a walk on the ramparts and the beach of Sillon.

Hotel Ajoncs d'Or is located in the heart of the historic fortified city walls of Saint Malo, 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers individually decorated rooms, which feature original artwork and free Wi-Fi access.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms are accessible by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the spacious bright dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Ajoncs d'Or hotel bar.

The hotel is conveniently placed to make the most of St Malo's many famous restaurants. In the summer, Saint Malo is a lively seaside resort featuring numerous outdoor and beach activities. Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is 1.8 km away. Private parking is available for an additional fee and must be reserved in advance.

Sweet Apartment is located in Saint Malo, 2.5 km from Minihic Beach, 2.7 km from Palais du Grand Large, and 2.7 km from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. It is situated 1.8 km from Rochebonne Beach and features bicycle parking. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sillon Beach is 1.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and quiet street views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also comes with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast.

National Fort is 2.9 km from Sweet Apartment, while Grand Bé is 3.5 km from the property.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand offer comfortable rooms with a refined decoration.

The restaurant serves many traditional seafood and regional specialties.

Its unique façade to Saint Malo, and the presence of the birthplace of Chateaubriand make the building to be classified a historical monument.

Located in Saint Malo, just 1.3 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux, Grand Studio Bord de Mer provides beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. It is situated 2.1 km from Mole Beach and features free shuttle service. The property is 100 metres from Bas-Sablons Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The apartment includes 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with a shower, a seating area, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Solidor Tower is 400 metres from Grand Studio Bord de Mer, while Grand Bé is 2.5 km away.

The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers luxurious rooms and guests have free access to spa area and swimming pool.

Guest rooms are air-conditioned and feature parquet flooring. They include flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a spacious bathroom.

The terrace has a panoramic sea view. The open-air hot tub is located on the patio. The modern fitness room includes the latest exercise equipment and massages are offered at an extra cost.

The lounge bar in the Oceania Saint Malo offers a variety of cocktails and drinks and can accommodate private cocktail parties. It also offers a dining menu for evening meals. Breakfast is served daily.

The Oceania is 1.5 km from the Saint-Malo Train Station and 7 km from the airport. On-site parking is available. English, Spanish, German and French are spoken at reception.

In the Sillon district of Saint Malo, close to Eventail Beach, Le Grand Sillon features a terrace and a washing machine. Featuring free private parking, the 3-star apartment is a few steps from Sillon Beach. Outdoor seating is also available at the apartment.

Providing a balcony with sea views, this apartment also provides guests with a TV, a well-equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near Le Grand Sillon include Bon Secours Beach, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

Nestled within the fortified walls of Saint-Malo, Hotel Cartier Intra-muros resides at the very heart of the city, offering easy access to its vibrant surroundings. Just 280 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and a mere 500 metres from the beach and the English Channel, our hotel boasts a modern décor and air-conditioned guest rooms equipped with complimentary internet access.
Each room features flat-screen TVs for your entertainment. With en suite bathrooms and plush carpet flooring, our guest rooms offer the ultimate in comfort and relaxation, fully renovated to meet your needs.
Indulge in a buffet-style breakfast each morning, served in our inviting breakfast area or the privacy of your own room.
Conveniently located, Saint-Malo Cathedral is a mere 120 metres away, while the Saint-Malo Train Station is just a 5-minute drive from our doorstep.
While our central location ensures easy exploration of the city, we understand that it also means exposure to its lively activities. Rest assured, all windows at Hotel Cartier Intramuros are equipped with double glazing to minimise any potential disturbances. While we cannot guarantee complete silence, we strive to provide a peaceful retreat for our guests.

hotel_name: Haven of peace near the beaches in Saint-Malo
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Haven of peace near the beaches in Saint-Malo is an accommodation set in Saint Malo, just 500 metres from Bon Secours Beach and 600 metres from Sillon Beach. The property is located 1.1 km from National Fort, 2.5 km from Solidor Tower and 9.3 km from Port-Breton Park. The property is 400 metres from Eventail Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Grand Bé, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

Ideally located in Saint Malo, L'AccrocheCoeur offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 4-star guest house offers full-day security and a concierge service. Guests can enjoy city views.

The units in the guest house are fitted with a coffee machine and an iPad. Guests can have fruits delivered to their room. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Bon Secours Beach, Mole Beach and Eventail Beach.

Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

Ideally located in Saint Malo, Hôtel San Pedro offers an à la carte breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to Grand Bé, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel San Pedro also have a city view.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and free use of bicycles is available at this 2-star hotel.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bon Secours Beach, Mole Beach and Eventail Beach.

Offering city views, Appartement Bayeux is an accommodation set in Bayeux, 300 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry and 400 metres from Baron Gerard Museum. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a shuttle service, while a car rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and 4 living rooms with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Activities such as cycling, hiking, walking tours can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the apartment.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 600 metres from Appartement Bayeux, while German Battery of D-Day is 8.7 km from the property. Caen–Carpiquet Airport is 27 km away.

Featuring 2-star accommodation, Hôtel Le Saint Patrice is situated in Bayeux, 800 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 1.2 km from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The property is around 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day, 11 km from D-Day Museum and 12 km from Arromanches 360. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a city view. The units in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 20 km from the hotel, while Omaha Beach is 20 km away. Caen–Carpiquet Airport is 28 km from the property.

Hotel Brasserie Armoricaine is situated conveniently in Saint Malo, and features a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. The property is situated less than 1 km from Palais du Grand Large, a 10-minute walk from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and 1.3 km from National Fort. The property is non-smoking and is set 100 metres from Bon Secours Beach.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Brasserie Armoricaine include Mole Beach, Eventail Beach and Grand Bé.

hotel_name: La Verrière Saint-Martin - Historic Center & WIFI
description:
La Verrière Saint-Martin - Historic Center & WIFI, a property with a shared lounge, is set in Bayeux, 500 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, 300 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux, as well as 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day. The property is around 11 km from D-Day Museum, 11 km from Arromanches 360 and 21 km from Omaha Beach Memorial Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Baron Gerard Museum is 200 metres away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.
