Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 25 km from Hostel 20 Bayonne, while Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 26 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Bayonne. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is a sauna, evening entertainment and room service.

At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All guest rooms at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 12 km from the accommodation, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 22 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 5 km away.

Featuring free WiFi and soundproofed bedrooms, B&B HOTEL Bayonne is situated in Bayonne, just 3 km from Biarritz Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available, including bread, jam, compote, eggs, bacon and hot drinks.

Sainte Marie Cathedral is 3.3 km from B&B HOTEL Bayonne, while Basque Coast Hospital Centre is 2.3 km from the property.

This hotel sits in the heart Bayonne’s historical town, in front of the Saint Esprit bridge. It offers free Wi-Fi and en suite rooms.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Cote Basque are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning and are accessible by lift. Hairdryers can be requested.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning.

The hotel is 100 metres from Bayonne train station,  5 km from Biarritz and 30 km from San Sebastien. A public car park is available nearby at an extra cost.

Set in Bayonne, just 700 metres from the city centre and Ste Marie Cathedral, Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and subject to availability.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Bayonne Arenes Bullring is 600 metres away and Ansot Park just 1.6 km away. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre L’Okko is located 5 km from the Ocean beaches. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port is situated in the centre of La Rochelle on the Old Port area in front of the medieval towers. It offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Some of the guest rooms offer a view of the port and others, a view of the interior, flowered courtyard. All rooms have a TV.

Breakfast is available daily and served to your room.

The area surrounding the Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port has a number of restaurants and bars, as well as the aquarium and La Coursive Theatre. A shuttle to the islands (Oléron, Ré..) and Fort Boyard is available 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The secure parking is located 500 metres away.

hotel_name: Iri Etxea - Appt 2 chambre à Bayonne
description:
Iri Etxea - Appt 2 chambre à Bayonne, a property with a garden, is set in Bayonne, 23 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 23 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church, as well as 36 km from Hendaye Train Station. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 13 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

FICOBA is 36 km from the apartment, while Pasaiako portua is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from Iri Etxea - Appt 2 chambre à Bayonne.

Offering city views, Appartements Les Rochelais is an accommodation set in La Rochelle, 1.1 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 1.3 km from L'Espace Encan. This 3-star apartment offers full-day security and private check-in and check-out. The property is 1.3 km from Concurrence Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Bunker La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 6 km away.

Set within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR offers accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Guests at Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and walking tours.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 23 km from the accommodation, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

Located in the heart of the city and footsteps from the old port of La Rochelle, the hotel welcomes you in a genuine 18th century ship owner’s residence.

Set between the Market Place and Verdun Square, Hotel De La Paix features 19 comfortable rooms for one to 5 people, and a warm and friendly welcome whether you are on a business trip or a family holiday. 

The hotel also offers new services like hiring of meeting rooms and Wi-Fi access in all the rooms, and the chef’s cuisine is at once creative and traditional.

Situated in the centre of La Rochelle, just 800 metres from Concurrence Beach and 3 km from Plage Du Roux, The Clock House, 3 étoiles features accommodation with inner courtyard views and free WiFi. The property has quiet street views and is 1.3 km from L'Espace Encan and 1.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from La Rochelle Train Station.

Boasting a DVD player, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room, a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Tour de la Chaine and La Rochelle Cathedral. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km from the property.

hotel_name: Le Masq Hôtel Best Western Premier
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.

Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries.

In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.

La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away. Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.

Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV. Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.

Located in the heart of La Rochelle, just a 10-minute walk from the train station and right next to the harbour, Hôtel Le Rupella offers en-suite rooms with free WiFi access and a desk.

All rooms at Hôtel Le Rupella also have a flat-screen TV as well as a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or a shower and free toiletries. Some rooms feature a balcony.

Offering panoramic views over the harbour, the hotel’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine. Guests can also sip a drink at the on-site bar and enjoy their breakfast in their room.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and is located 850 metres from the city’s Aquarium and a 5-minute drive from La Rochelle Parc Expo.

Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a tennis court. WiFi is free of charge throughout the property. There is also a hot tub with with a massage water jets bath, sauna and hammam, which guests can enjoy at an extra cost.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms include a walk-in shower or bath tub and toilet.

The continental breakfast of French pastries, cheeses, fruit, eggs, cereals, jams, ham, honey and tea is available daily.

Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois is 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station. A limited number of free private parking spaces can be found onsite and private underground parking is available for an extra charge.

Situated in La Rochelle, 1.1 km from Plage Du Roux, ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA features accommodation with spa facilities and a fitness room. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

The aparthotel features a garden and sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA include Minimes, L'Espace Encan and La Rochelle Train Station. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km from the property.

Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

Located in La Rochelle, beside Port des Minimes, this residence offers a covered, heated pool and a well being centre. It is a 5-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Vieux Port. On-site parking is available, at a surcharge, based on availability.

Each soundproofed apartment and studio at the Lagrange Appart'Hotel l’Escale Marine has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave grill oven, a private bathroom and free WiFi. All apartment and suites are accessible by a lift.

Massages treatments are available at a surcharge and upon request. It is 1 km from La Rochelle Ville Train station, and 8 km from the La Rochelle- île de Ré Airport.

Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, Appartements Les Rochelais offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property features inner courtyard views and is 2.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 1.1 km from La Rochelle Train Station. The property is 700 metres from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre. The parking on site is limited and available upon request.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Wellness centre is only available upon request.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and 300 metres from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.

The Pierre & Vacances Centre offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.

The residence is serviced by a lift and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.

The Residence Pierre & Vacances Centre is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.

hotel_name: La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes
description:
La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes provides accommodation located 400 metres from the centre of La Rochelle and offers a terrace and a bar. With city views, this accommodation features a patio. The guest house features family rooms.

The units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. Guests can have wine or champagne, fruits and chocolates or cookies delivered to their room. All units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Concurrence Beach, La Rochelle Train Station and L'Espace Encan. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km away.

Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

Offering a garden and quiet street view, La villa voyage is situated in La Rochelle, 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from L'Espace Encan. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the holiday home free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.1 km from Concurrence Beach.

The 2-bedroom holiday home has a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A water park is available on-site and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of La villa voyage.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 6.4 km from the accommodation, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 2.6 km from the property. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 2 km away.

hotel_name: Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Les Minimes is located in La Rochelle, just a few steps from the harbour and only a 15-minute walk from the train station and the marina. It offers self-catering apartments and studios for minimum stays of 4 nights.

Each soundproofed apartment at the Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes is fully furnished and offers carpet and parquet floors, fully equipped kitchenette and private bathroom.

Beds are made before arrival and a house cleaning service is provided once a week for free. For guests coming by car, private parking is available.

The La Rochelle SNCF Train Station and Les Minimes are both just a 15-minute walk from the residence.

hotel_name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodation with a seating area and an LCD TV.

The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 15 km away.

The Hotel Hôtel AKENA Biarritz - Grande plage is located just 300 metres from the main beach of Biarritz, close to the town centre. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The comfortable guest rooms are all air-conditioned and have a TV and wooden floors.

Private parking is available on site upon request, subject to availability. The casino, spa centre and the Palais de Congres are less than 10 minutes walk from the Hotel Hôtel AKENA Biarritz - Grande plage, and the Golf du Phare is only 900m away.

hotel_name: Villa Babeth by Nuits au Port
description:
Offering a garden and quiet street view, Villa Babeth by Nuits au Port is set in La Rochelle, less than 1 km from Minimes and a 15-minute walk from Plage Du Roux. This beachfront property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi. La Rochelle Train Station is 2.4 km from the villa and Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 3 km away.

The villa comes with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the villa include L'Espace Encan, The Minimes Marina and Musée Maritime de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 9 km away.

Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

Situated 500 metres from Grande Plage and 500 metres from Plage Miramar in the centre of Biarritz, Appartement Marna - Welkeys features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This apartment offers accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 800 metres from Plage Pêcheurs.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 17 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 3 km away.

The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

In a residential area, a stone's throw from the main beach, the town centre and the casino, the Logis Val Flores offers you the charm of an old-style villa.

Individually decorated, the rooms feature a TV with Canal + channels, as well as a private bathroom. They also provide free WiFi internet access.

Weather permitting, guests can enjoy their breakfast on Logis Val Flores' outdoor terrace.

Free parking with 10 spaces in total is provided at the Logis Val Flores, making it easy to explore Biarritz and the Basque coastline by car.

Set in the centre of Biarritz, within 500 metres of Cote des Basques Beach and 500 metres of Grande Plage, La Casa Cosy, Appart'Hôtel is an accommodation offering inner courtyard views. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and parking on-site.

The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Plage Pêcheurs is 700 metres from the aparthotel, while Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.1 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 3 km away.

hotel_name: Studio et piscine sur la grande plage
description:
Set in Biarritz, 400 metres from Grande Plage, Studio et piscine sur la grande plage offers accommodation with pool with a view, free WiFi, free shuttle service, and a lift. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to have groceries delivered.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Biarritz, like hiking.

Plage Miramar is 400 metres from Studio et piscine sur la grande plage, while Plage Pêcheurs is 500 metres away. Biarritz Airport is 3 km from the property.

hotel_name: Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre
description:
Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre is located in Biarritz, 300 metres from the beach and 5 minutes from the convention centres Bellevue, Casino and Gare du Midi as well as 100 metres from Biarritz central market. It offers free WiFi and Canal + channel.

The charming Maison du Lierre hotel provides numerous services. These include breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace in summertime. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests also access the onsite sauna, massage services and spa treatments.

Each room has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The rooms overlook an interior courtyard. Some have a balcony or terrace.

Guests have access to a private living room with a computer corner.

Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna is located in the city centre of Biarritz, just 300 metres from the beach. The self-catering residence offers spacious apartments. At an extra cost, guest can access a wellness centre with a sauna, hammam and solarium.

The studios and apartments at the Haguna residence are fully furnished and include a TV, a living area and a private bathroom. The kitchens include cooking facilities, dishwasher, fridge and microwave.

Guests can choose the Comfort Formula, which must be purchased on line before the arrival. It includes beds made for arrival, change of bathroom linen mid-stay, mid-stay cleaning.

Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna is an ideal base for exploring the Basque coast. Bayonne is just a 10-minute drive from Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna and San Sebastian is a 35-minute drive away. Books and board games are available for free.

Baked goods can be ordered at the reception the evening before and served as a buffet. A bakery menu is available in the apartment and at reception, this service is at an additional cost.

Green Key-awarded.

Set in Biarritz in the Aquitaine region, with Plage Pêcheurs and Cote des Basques Beach nearby, Studio Marisca - Welkeys provides accommodation with free private parking. The property is located 2.7 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 17 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 17 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. The property is 700 metres from Grande Plage, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Hendaye Train Station is 31 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Studio Marisca - Welkeys.

hotel_name: Appartement chic à Biarritz avec vue sur montagnes - 70 m²
description:
Situated in Biarritz and only 200 metres from Cote des Basques Beach, Appartement chic à Biarritz avec vue sur montagnes - 70 m² features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is located 500 metres from Plage Milady, 2.9 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 17 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Plage Marbella.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 17 km from the apartment, while Hendaye Train Station is 31 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 4 km away.

In the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, close to Plage Pêcheurs, Appartement Marbella - Welkeys features a casino, free WiFi and a washing machine. It is situated 600 metres from Cote des Basques Beach and features a lift. The property is 200 metres from Grande Plage, and within 100 metres of the city centre.

The apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plage Marbella is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.4 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 3 km away.

A 14-room hotel set in a early 20th-century house, Hôtel Saint James is located at the historic centre of Biarritz, just a 5-minute walk from the main beaches, including Côte des Basques and La Grande Plage. The harbour, the convention centre and the Barriere Casino are also located within walking distance.

The Saint James offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are located on 3 different floors and not serviced by a lift.

description:

Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays.

This option, which costs €18 per day per vehicle, must be booked in advance (subject to availability, as the number of spaces is limited).

Your pet (dog or cat) is welcome (ON RESERVATION - one pet per room - supplement of €25 per day applies). Please contact us beforehand.

Our relaxation area is available until midnight (sauna, steam room, fitness room, swimming pool heated between 23° and 26°).

hotel_name: La Villa Vaihéré en Camargue, l'Hibiscus et le Magnolia
description:

There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features inner courtyard views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with bathrobes, a shower and slippers. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Montpellier Arena is 44 km from La Villa Vaihéré en Camargue, l'Hibiscus et le Magnolia, while Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 44 km from the property. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 37 km away.

Every room includes a double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath or a shower.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property with different cocktails, West Indian rhums, and aperitif board with local products.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling. The natural Camargue parc is located 2 kms away from the property.

A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests can grab a bite to eat in an outdoor dining area at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, like fishing.

Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have air conditioning, a terrace or a view of the sea.

Horse-riding and tennis are among the activities available in the local area. Free public parking is possible nearby and the property has a motorbike/bike garage that guests can use free of charge.

The heated non-smoking rooms at Le Mirage feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. A mosquito net and a private bathroom are also provided.

hotel_name: Maison ravissante à Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer avec piscine partagée
description:

All of the rooms at Thalacap Camargue have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access and air conditioning.

In the summer, guests can enjoy a drink on the patio or sun terrace.  There is a wellness center with a sauna and massages are also available on request.

in the heart of a 250-hectare provencal farmhouse, in a very family atmosphere, the cavallini manade offers rooms for rent by the night, or gites for 5,4,2 people for weekly rentals or short stays during the low season.

All rooms are on the 1st floor in the "vieux mas" building, with TV and private bathroom with shower and toilet or bath and toilet.

each gite has a living room with fully-equipped kitchen, reversible air-conditioning and a private terrace.

 all rentals have access to a large garden, under a pinede, with a swimming pool open from mid-May to the end of september, with ping-pong table, children's games, on site it will be possible to make various ballads on the paths of the mas to discover the fauna and flora of camargue, and during the summer period you can participate in our camarguaises days in cart pulled with our gardians, a unique experience to discover our breeding of camargue bulls.

les saintes maries de la mer is 10km from the property, 28km from Arles and 26km from Aigues mortes, the ideal location for being close to the Ornithological Park, partner horse rides, the Aigues mortes salt marshes, Arles arenes...

hotel_name: Oh! Campings - Le Clos du Rhône
description:
Set near Clos Du Rhone Beach and Crin Blanc Beach, Oh! Campings - Le Clos du Rhône is in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and offers free private parking and a restaurant. Located on the beachfront, this property has a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from Arenas Beach.

hotel_name: Maison "COSY" avec Parking Privé et Climatisation
description:

The Calabrun can also organise horse riding and jeep tours.

Free private parking is available on site and the hotel is an hour’s drive south of Nimes.

The property is non-smoking and is located 35 km from Arles Amphitheatre.

Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence. The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away. Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

Ideally located on a peaceful street in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, this residence is a 10-minute walk from the cafés and fountains on Cours Mirabeau. Gare d’Aix-en-Provence is 900 metres away. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

Apartments and studios at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Centre are contemporary in style and offer an LCD TV. All have a kitchen with hotplates and some have a separate bedroom.

Breakfast and drinks and snacks vending machines are some of the other facilities on offer at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Centre. There is also a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service.

Rotonde Square is a 5-minute walk away and Aix-en-Provence Natural History Museum is just 850 metres from the residence. For guests arriving by car, private indoor parking is possible on site, according to availability. A8 highway is 2.5 km away.

Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars. Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie. During the summertime La Terrasse de la Tour is the hotel’s outdoor grill, serving grilled dishes and salads by the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa. Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath. There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins boasts a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

hotel_name: Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 3 km from the historical centre and Cours Mirabeau, Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in each room.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves contemporary French cuisine that can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months. Campanile Aix-en-Provence also offers hot and cold buffet.

The hotel is serviced by a lift and free private parking is available on site. A bus stop can be found opposite the hotel, where direct bus access is available to the city centre.

The property is 13 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station and 8 km away from Aix en Provence Arena stadium and concert hall. Marseille Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Nearby facilties and locations : Sismic ( Concert and Entertenaiment), L'Arena ( Concert and Entertenaiment), Grand Theatre de Provence, Private Hospital

Attractions : Pavillon Vendome, Provencal Market (3km)

hotel_name: Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville is 25 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 15 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.

Featuring free WiFi, B&B Hotel Aix en Provence Le Tholonet is a hotel in Les Artauds, 25 km from Marseille. Free private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

Aix-en-Provence is 3.7 km from B&B Hotel Le Tholonet, while Cassis is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Provence Airport, 23 km from B&B Hotel Aix en Provence Le Tholonet.

Le Concorde is ideally located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum. It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.

Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is located a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, next to an 18-hole golf course. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and has free WiFi throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or private terrace.

The hotel restaurant is open from Sunday evening to Friday midday. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar from 10am to 10pm . Buffet Breakfast is available.

There are 3 meeting rooms available to organise meetings, workshops or cocktails. Guests have access to the garden and terrace.

Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is just 17.4 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 6.7 km away from Marseille TGV Train Station. Free parking is available on site.

Situated in Aix-en-Provence, within 800 metres of Cours Mirabeau and Saint-Sauveur Cathedral, Hotel Cardinal features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Attractions in the area include Aix-en-Provence Congress Centre, a 3-minute walk away.

The individually decorated rooms and suites in the hotel are equipped with a desk. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette, a microwave, a fridge, a stovetop and a coffee machine.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Electric car charging station is available subject to availability. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

Centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Paul is only 150 metres from the Spa, the Palais des Festivals and the historical part of the city. It features a garden with a terrace area. Free WiFi is available in all the rooms.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades. There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away. Marseille is 35.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

This Séjours & Affaires residence is located in Aix-en-Provence near the Cours Mirabeau. It offers furnished studios and free Wi-Fi internet access.

All of the studios at Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau are soundproof and have a complete kitchen area with fridge, microwave, hotplates and dishes. All of them are serviced by a lift.

The studios have fold-out sofa beds, and a house cleaning including the change of linen is provided once a week.

Located in Aix-en-Provence, Chalet de Provence provides accommodation with private pool, free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The air-conditioned accommodation is 34 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 35 km from Joliette Metro Station.

The apartment with a terrace and pool views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers garden views.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 36 km from the apartment, while Vieux Port Metro station is 36 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 30 km from the property.

hotel_name: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers air-conditioned accommodation in Marseille, only 550 metres from the port. Marseille Saint-Charles train station is a 12-minute walk away from the property.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

hotel_name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Appart'City Confort Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome
description:
Appart'City Confort Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome, just 200 metres from Périer Metro Station, which leads directly to the centre of Marseille, The European and Mediterranean Civilisations Museum (MuCEM), and the old port. Palais des Congrès and the Vélodrome Stadium are next to the property.

The accommodation is contemporary in style and has an LCD TV. Each room, suite and studio also have a private bathroom and free toiletries.

The buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. Additional facilities at this property include free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. There is the possibility to use the computers for free in the entertainment room, as well as the Nespresso Corner.

The property is ideally located just 4 metro stops from Saint-Charles Train Station. Parking is available for an extra cost.

hotel_name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer is located in a residential district, 750 metres from the Palais des Congrès and 1 km from the Velodrome Stadium. This aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool. Perier Metro Station is just 150 metres away and WiFi access is free.

A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodation at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.

A buffet breakfast of French viennoiseries is served every morning in Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer 's breakfast room. Children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. There are drinks and snacks vending machines in the 24-hour reception, which also has luggage storage.

The property can be accessed from the A50, a 5-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy the beach 4 km away. Marseille Old Port is 3 km away and Parc Chanot is an 8-minute walk from this residence. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

hotel_name: Le Paul - Appart de standing avec 2 ch et clim
description:
In the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, close to Saint-Ferreol Street, Le Paul - Appart de standing avec 2 ch et clim has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property features city views and is 2.5 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.7 km from Prophete. The property is a few steps from the city centre and 1.8 km from Plage des Catalans.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Vieux Port Metro station, Castellane Metro Station and Palais du Pharo. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km from the property.

Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi.

Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

A continental breakfast is available daily in the dining room. The reception is open every day from 07:30 to 12:30 and from 14:00 to 22:30.

Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière.

Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

Located in the centre of Marseille, Les Appartements du Vieux Port is 150 metres from the Old Port. The apartments offer free WiFi and a modern-style décor.

All apartments feature a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can prepare their own meals in the kitchen, which is equipped with kitchenware, an oven and a fridge. A stove, a coffee machine are also provided, and some apartments have a dishwasher.

Les Appartements du Vieux Port is a 2-minute drive from the Opera and 170 metres from the Marseille Tourism Office. A large range of restaurants, cafés and shops can be found in the area.

hotel_name: TERRASSE FADOLI - Grande terrasse avec vue mer et cathédrale
description:
Right in the heart of Marseille, situated within a short distance of Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Vieux Port Metro station, TERRASSE FADOLI - Grande terrasse avec vue mer et cathédrale offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is set 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.4 km from Plage des Catalans.

The apartment with a terrace and sea views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Saint-Ferreol Street and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

hotel_name: 15 minutes du Vieux Port, Confort et Espace au calme du Palais Longchamp
description:
Set in Marseille, 2.6 km from La Timone Metro Station and 1.8 km from Saint-Ferreol Street, 15 minutes du Vieux Port, Confort et Espace au calme du Palais Longchamp offers air conditioning. The property is located 2.9 km from Castellane Metro Station, 2.9 km from Joliette Metro Station and 3.1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is less than 1 km away.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms fitted with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Vieux Port Metro station is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 3.5 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km away.

City Résidence Marseille offers self-catering accommodation in Marseille. The property is 4 km from Marseille's city centre and 5 km from Velodrome Stadium. Free WiFi access is provided.

The studios at City Résidence Marseille feature a flat-screen TV and cable channels. The bathroom is complete with shower and toilet. Some rooms have a balcony.

There is a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. A supermarket can be found 600 metres away.

A breakfast box is available at the reception desk for an extra fee upon request. The box includes 1 coffee pod, 1 tea bag, milk, fruit juice, crispbread, butter, jam, chocolate spread, fruit compote and a madeleine.

This accommodation is 4.5 km from Marseille Old Port and 5 km from Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is accessible by tramway and bus and it offers paid private underground parking. Additional free public parking is available on the street.

Situated right in the heart of Marseille, 2.2 km from Plage des Catalans, L'escapade marseillaise features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Joliette Metro Station, and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Vieux Port Metro station.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation offers a fireplace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Castellane Metro Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km from the property.

Right in the heart of Marseille, situated within a short distance of Plage des Catalans and Saint-Ferreol Street, Le cocon de Louise-Vieux Port offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. The property features sea and city views, and is 2.7 km from Fausse Monnaie. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.9 km from Plage de Maldorme.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Vieux Port Metro station, Castellane Metro Station and Palais du Pharo. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

Residhotel Le Grand Prado is in central Marseille, 100 metres from Perier Metro Station. This residence offers furnished apartments and studios with a kitchenette.

All of the air-conditioned apartments and studios at Le Grand Prado feature a flat-screen TV. Each has a private bathroom with a bathtub. Most also have a furnished, private balcony.

Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette, which offers a microwave, fridge, hot-plates and a coffee maker. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast in the lunch room where WiFi is also accessible.

The Old Port is 2 km away and guests can walk to Stade Vélodrome in 20 minutes.

Attractively set in Marseille, The People - Marseille features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. Boasting a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, a 12-minute walk from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at the hostel.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Popular points of interest near The People - Marseille include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Saint-Ferreol Street. Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

hotel_name: LE DIVILLIEN - Bel et grand appartement idéalement situé
description:
LE DIVILLIEN - Bel et grand appartement idéalement situé is situated in the Castellane et Préfecture district of Marseille, 100 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street, less than 1 km from Castellane Metro Station and a 8-minute walk from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is set 2.3 km from La Timone Metro Station, 1.4 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 1.6 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Plage des Catalans is 2.4 km away.

The spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Palais du Pharo is 2.9 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km away.

In a central area of Marseille, Les Ô du Panier features mountain views from the terrace. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Joliette Metro Station, Vieux Port Metro station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km away.

hotel_name: Le Balcon du Vieux-Port-Amazing Sea View
description:
An apartment nestled in the centre of Marseille, Le Balcon du Vieux-Port-Amazing Sea View has parking on-site, free WiFi, a garden and bar. The property is conveniently located within easy reach of Plage des Catalans and Vieux Port Metro station. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals. Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre. Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

Marseille City Chambres&Appartements offers rooms and apartments located a 10-minute walk from Marseille’s Old Port and from Saint-Charles, the main train station. It features free Wi-Fi access.

The air-conditioned rooms includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The apartments come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen. There is a bathroom with a shower, a towel warmer and a toilet.

You will find bars and restaurants within 200 metres of the property. La Canebière, Marseille’s historic high street, is a 10-minute walk away as well as the EuroMéditerranée business district.

Set in Marseille and with Joliette Metro Station reachable within 1.1 km, Résidence Kley offers a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is around 2.4 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, 3.6 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.6 km from Castellane Metro Station. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

You can play table tennis at Résidence Kley.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and Vieux Port Metro station. Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

Situated in the centre of Marseille, Sous le Clocher features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property has garden and inner courtyard views, and is 1 km from Joliette Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Plage des Catalans.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Vieux Port Metro station, Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

Le Clocher par Dodo-a-Cassis is located in Cassis, less than 1 km from Anse de Corton Beach, 20 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, and 20 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 400 metres from Grande Mer, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 800 metres from Bestouan.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 20 km from the apartment, while La Timone Metro Station is 21 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 45 km away.

Le CapCanaille par Dodo-a-Cassis is set in Cassis, 1.5 km from Anse de Corton Beach, 1.6 km from Bestouan, as well as 18 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Grande Mer.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 19 km from the apartment, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 19 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 44 km from the property.

Le Bosquet 3 par Dodo-a-Cassis is set in Cassis, 1.3 km from Anse de Corton Beach, 20 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, as well as 20 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 600 metres from Bestouan, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 800 metres from Grande Mer.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. The property offers city views.

Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 20 km from the apartment, while La Timone Metro Station is 21 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km from the property.

Situated in Cassis, 600 metres from Anse de Corton Beach and less than 1 km from Bestouan, Le Zòu par Dodo-a-Cassis offers air conditioning. The property is set 20 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, 20 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station and 20 km from Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grande Mer is 200 metres away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

La Timone Metro Station is 21 km from the apartment, while Castellane Metro Station is 22 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km away.

Situated in Cassis, 1.1 km from Grande Mer and 1.4 km from Bestouan, LE REVE BLEU offers an open-air bath and air conditioning. This villa has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.6 km from Anse de Corton Beach.
